title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: Blockchain company Ripple has opened its first office in Canada, according to a Wednesday announcement.Its new Toronto-based office will serve as the company’s “key engineering hub.” Garlinghouse says that the country’s most populous city has plenty of talent.Ripple will go on a hiring spree in Toronto, aiming to hire “hundreds” of blockchain software engineers in the long run. Full Details: https://u.today/ripple-opens-its-first-office-in-canada

comments.author: $anounimus$
comments.body: Quote from: tokyohd on June 23, 2022, 04:07:58 AMBlockchain company Ripple has opened its first office in Canada, according to a Wednesday announcement.Its new Toronto-based office will serve as the company’s “key engineering hub.” Garlinghouse says that the country’s most populous city has plenty of talent.I think a good idea for the expansion and Obviously, there is a huge demand for top-tier blockchain talent around the world. This developer is in great demand. Business is booming in Toronto's startup scene and many companies are opening new offices now. Ripple is a financial technology-based company that uses blockchain technology to provide real-time global payments, similar to other cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin and Litecoin. In fact, Ripple is targeting banks and payment providers in an effort to provide a frictionless experience for customers who are used to paying with credit or debit cards at average transaction fees.
